overview: When handsome boarder Srikar (Raja) moves into the home of fun-loving Harini (Poonam Bajwa), the two soon fall in love. But before they can profess their feelings, misunderstandings and a vengeful acquaintance threaten to ruin their chance at happiness. Anu Mehta, Naresh, K. Vishwanath and Sudha co-star in this love story directed by Jitender Y.
title: Veduka
